channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.description: Fenghua Li and Hui Li and Ben Niu and Jinjun Chen

item.title: Leakage Resilient Secret Sharing and Applications
item.description: Akshayaram Srinivasan and Prashant Nalini Vasudevan

item.description: Eunkyung Kim and Hyang-Sook Lee and Jeongeun Park
